body.name: Gain Fabric Softener, Original Scent, 164 fl oz, 190 Loads, HE Compatible
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 29 mins
features: IRRESISTIBLE SCENT: A light scent of dewy spring freshness
INDULGENT SOFTNESS: Makes your clothes softer, decreases static and adds more amazing Gain scent
LONG-LASTING SCENT: Now with AromaboostTM for weeks of lasting freshness
FULL LINE-UP OF PRODUCTS: Available in matching scents across Laundry Detergent, Scent Booster Beads and Dryer Sheets
WORKS IN ALL MACHINES: Compatible with top load, front load, High efficiency (HE), or non-HE
REDUCED CARBON FOOTPRINT: The formula is made with 100% renewable wind power electricity
body.description: This is not your everyday fabric softener. This is pure liquid ahhhhmazing. With the awe-inspiring scent of a blooming meadow and the oh-so-gentle softness found in Gain Spring Daydream Fabric Softener, your laundry will feel as good as it smells. Let the self-hugging begin. And because of our incredible Aromaboost technology, you can indulge your senses for weeks of long-lasting freshness. With Gain Spring Daydream Fabric Softener, you’re in for an experience that is so soft and so scenty, you’re sure to fall in love. For the same amazing scent, try Gain Spring Daydream Laundry Detergent, In-Wash Scent Booster Beads and Dryer Sheets too.

reviews.reviewText: Great smell, I love how my clothes smell after washing my clothes. Long lasting product at a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The smell is the best and it makes everything spotless.Grest product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creature Comfort must-have
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing more relaxing and comforting than following up a hot bath with a towel freshly washed using this fabric softener. The fresh, clean scent is like a warm hug. This product has a lasting and strong clean scent that carries through to all of our laundry bringing me back to that feeling of comfort every time I bury my nose in a clean sweat shirt or slip into bed after a long day. I highly recommend this product in the original scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best smelling laundry detergent
reviews.reviewText: I just love the scent of Gain! So does family. It’s cheaper than Tide and cleans just as well with no discernible difference from Tide that I’ve observed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells fresh! Re-use and/or Recycle container!
reviews.reviewText: Overall a great product we have been using for years. It makes your clothes smell great and they are nice and soft! We have had no issues using this in our HE washer. We have had no issues with the container.As an aside, the container has many fabulous uses after you are done with it! Of course, you can always just recycle, but there are a gazillion ways to also reuse this amazing container!I made a fun mouse house laundry room with my granddaughters with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The smell last a long time.
reviews.reviewText: It makes my clothes soft and smell good. I bought it because it was on sale and I like a good deal. It's not my favorite scent but I couldn't pass it up for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Hillbilly's Heaven: Gain Fabric Softener Review
reviews.reviewText: Howdy, y'all! I reckon I've got somethin' mighty special to share with ya today. This here's my review of the Gain Fabric Softener in the original scent. Now, let me tell ya, this ain't your run-of-the-mill fabric softener. It's like a pure liquid blessin' from the heavens above.First things first, let's talk about the scent. Mmm-mmm! It's like a whiff of that fresh spring air after a good rain. I gotta admit, I love the smell of Gain. 'Round these parts, we can't afford what them city slickers call cologne, so we rely on Gain to give us that extra bit of fancy freshness.Now, what's even better is how this softener treats your clothes. It's like a gentle hug from a long-lost friend. My overalls, shirts, and even them delicate unmentionables come out feelin' softer than a bunny's tail. It even helps with them pesky static cling problems. No more shocks and surprises when I'm out milkin' the cows!One thing I truly appreciate about this Gain Fabric Softener is that it works with all types of machines. Whether it's an old top-loader or one of them fancy high-efficiency contraptions, it gets the job done. And here's a little secret for ya: this formula is made usin' 100% renewable wind power electricity. Ain't that somethin'?But let me tell ya, the real magic happens when it comes to the long-lasting freshness. Thanks to the newfangled aroma boost technology, the scent sticks around for weeks. That means every time you open that dresser drawer, you'll be greeted with that delightful Gain smell. It's like a little slice of paradise right in your closet.And if you're like me, who likes to keep things matchin', you'll be pleased to know that Gain offers a whole range of products. They got the laundry detergent, scent booster beads, and dryer sheets, all in the same tantalizin' scent. It's like a symphony of freshness for your clothes.In a nutshell, Gain Fabric Softener is a little piece of heaven in a bottle. It's got the irresistible scent, the indulgent softness, and it plays nice with any type of machine. So go ahead, treat yourself and your laundry to a taste of the good life. Once you try it, I reckon you'll fall head over heels in love, just like I did.Yeehaw!

Tiene un agradable olor me llego muy rapido y muy bien el embalaje
Me encanta el aroma y es un buen producto
一時期近所でgainのビーズが売ってたので、そっちを買ってましたが、売らなくなったので柔軟剤に戻しました。私は洗濯中や洗濯物のにおいが欲しいだけなので、柔軟剤の効果は気にしたことがなく、わかりません

reviews.reviewTitle: 香りがいつまでも続いてくれるおすすめの逸品です^_^
reviews.reviewText: いつもお気に入りで使用しています^_^

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells nice, works great to prevent wrinkles and static, and large size bottle is economical
reviews.reviewText: Excellent fabric softener. It smells amazing (and I do not have any allergic reaction to this softener or fragrance) It does great job softening clothes, especially tee shirts, sheets, and towels, and prevents them from being filled with static and stuck to one another when removing the laundry from the dryer. Definitely less ironing needed when I remember to use this in the wash.I love the large bottle - I feel this will last me a very long time, and it's less plastic to put in my recycling bins. Items smell really fresh and clean when I use this (in combo with the gain laundry powder).Recommending, great economical size and prime shipping options a great bonus,
